cab.content: (P 7573) From Secretary of State to Viceroy, Foreign Department,mh October 19:1).Clear the line. ;2605. Secret. Your telegram of 15th October, ,1201 S. Afghanistan. I presume that in.submitting your recommendations you have taken full account of latest developments at Kabul as disclosed in recent Black Jumbo telegrams; see especially telegram from Chief of General Staff, India, to War Office, No. X. 1727, dated 6th October, from which it appears that Afghans and Bolsheviks have reached final agreement for conclusion of treaty.
